data.title: Power plant profile: Noble Chateaugay, US
data.meta_description: Noble Chateaugay is a 126MW onshore wind power project. It is located in New York, the US.
data.text:
Description

The project was developed by Noble Environmental Power. Alberta Investment Management, Noble Environmental Power and The AES are currently owning the project.

The Noble Chateaugay (Noble Chateaugay Phase I), has 79.857m high towers.

Development status

The project is currently active. The project got commissioned in 2009.

Contractors involved

Noble Chateaugay (Noble Chateaugay Phase I) is equipped with GE Renewable Energy 1.5-82.5 turbines. The phase consists of 71 turbines with 1.5MW nameplate capacity.

Noble Chateaugay (Noble Chateaugay Phase II) is equipped with GE Renewable Energy 1.5-77 turbines. The phase consists of 13 turbines with 1.5MW nameplate capacity.

For more details on Noble Chateaugay, buy the profile here.

About Noble Environmental Power

Noble Environmental, Inc (Noble) is a wind power generation company that engaged in Consulting Services, Professional Services. The company is headquartered in United States.

This content was updated on 10 July 2024
